result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thomas A. Vogedes

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 3:25pm
INCLUDES 15CF1068, 15TR3937, 15TR5473, 15CM1257, 15CM1494, 16CM1272, 16CF803
State appears by ADA Sidney Brubacher.  Defendant appears in person, in custody, with Atty Genelle Johnson.
 
Parties need moment off record to clarify sentencing
OTR: 3:28pm
BOTR: 3:34pm
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
15TR3937:
Ct. 1 Operator violate red traffic light >> dismissed 
15TR5473:
Ct. 1 Refuse to take test for intoxication after arrest >> refusal deemed reasonable 
15CF1068:
Ct. 2 Operating while revoked (rev due to alcohol alc/contr subst/refusal) >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
Ct. 4 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
15CM1257:
Ct. 1 Operating while revoked (rev due to alcohol alc/contr subst/refusal) >> D&RI
15CM1494:
Ct. 1 Operating while revoked (rev due to alcohol alc/contr subst/refusal) >> D&RI
Ct. 2 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
16CM1272:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
Ct. 2 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
16CF803:
Ct. 3 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
Ct. 4 Resisting or Obstructing an Officer >> D&RI
Ct. 5 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
Ct. 6 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
COURT grants above
PLEA:
15CF1068:
Ct. 1 Operate with restricted controlled substance (5th) >> NO CONTEST
16CF803:
Ct. 1 Possession of Methamphetamine >> NO CONTEST
Ct. 2 Bail Jumping- Felony >> NO CONTEST 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 16CF803 Ct. 1- 3 years and 6 months WSPS- 1 and half years IC, 2 years ES. Ct. 2- 6 years WSPS- 3 years IC, 3 years ES. Sentences to run concurrent to each other and 15CF1068 Ct. 1. 227 days credit granted towards sentencing. CONDITIONS of ES: Maintain absolute sobriety from illegal drugs and alcohol. Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of two. Pay CC. Pay DNA surcharge and provide sample. 
COURT ORDERS: 15CF1068 Ct. 1- 6 years WSPS- 3 years IC, 3 years ES. Sentence to run concurrent to 16CF803 counts. 235 days credit granted towards sentencing. CONDITIONS of ES: Pay $2,420.00 fine inclusive of all costs (includes DNA surcharge). Provide DNA sample. 6 points against driving record. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Maintain absolute sobriety from illegal drugs and alcohol. 3 years driver's license revocation, granted administrative credit for any time already served. 3 years IID to be installed immediately, time will not being to run against deft license until obtain's valid license. 

Defendant is eligible for both prison programming- Substance Abuse & Challenge Incarceration

Deft is remanded to Marathon County Sheriff's Dept to be transported to Prison
Adj: 4:01pm
Final pre-trial on March 22, 2017 at 03:15 pm.
to Court from Defendant re: status of case
Status conference on March 15, 2017 at 02:30 pm.
Calendar call on December 14, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on November 14, 2016 at 09:45 am.
to Court from Defendant re: counsel etc
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Reduction of Bond
to Court from Defendant re: counsel etc

Clerk Marisa.

INCLUDES 15CM1257 AND 15CM1494.

Atty Toulouse notes deft had confused court date at time of missed appearance and notes parties have reached an agreement. 
COURT vacates bond forfeiture. 
Plea Hearing is set for 12/1/2015 at 3:15 pm in Br. 3. 
Adj: 2:09 pm

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 2:13 pm 
INCLUDES 15CM1494 AND 15CM1257. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft does NOT appear - Atty Kat Jackan appears on his behalf. 
Date and time was set for FPT. 
COURT authorizes $500 bench warrant and orders bond forfeited. 
BFH set for 10/8/2015 at 2pm in Br. 3. 
Adj: 2:15 pm
and Demand for Discovery & Inspection - includes 15CM1494 & 15TR3937

INCLUDES 15CM1257 & 15CM1494   Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license. Absolute sobriety. Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 before PTC 8/31/15. No controlled substances w/o a valid prescription and only in the amount prescribed.
